body: Parallel 42 Systems is located in the heart of Downtown Windsor, footsteps from the river we share with Detroit. We are a small team of developers, designers, and consultants. We're passionate about creating quality software and helping other teams do the same.

We built Motor City Murals to encourage folks to get out on the street and explore the neighbourhoods of their city, and the city across the river. We hope you like it, and we're interested in your feedback. Let us know by email how we can make this tour better.
